msbt.message: I just can't believe how much the horned dynastid can lift with its horn. It looks so puny!
Check out this giant stag's body! That's gotta be close to perfect muscle tone. For an insect, that is.
As much as I wanna wrestle that saw stag, there's just no way we're in the same weight class
I love the horned hercules' fighting style. It's totally like watching a superhero, !
What do you think? Is that mantis meditating or just sleeping?
Wow! This moth looks so cool. It's like it's wearing a tiny cape.
You're all shiny, little scarab beetle. You just finish a workout or something? Go you!
All the great purple emperor's gotta do is flex those wings and all the other bugs'll go runningor flying.
Have you seen the abs on that jewel beetle? You need to. They're amazing!
You seen this agrias butterfly? You'd need shoulders of steel and pecs of granite to swing those wings!
My swolest rival wears the same colors Why's an emperor butterfly taking sides?
A while ago I tried to do a late-night jog by firefly light. I ran right into a tree.
Atlas moths can get as big as me, right? I heard that somewhere. I don't think I'm cool with that.
It's HUGE! It's gotta be like the top athlete of the butterfly world
I could come up with so many cool workouts if I had a scorpion tail
Yikes If you ever wanna see me at top-speed, either take me to a track meet, or set a wasp loose.
I think I just realized I've never seen a firefly during the day. They look cool!
This man-faced stink bug keeps staring at me. Nobody beats me in a staring contest!
A walking leaf looks just like a leaf, ! Huh.
You can't hear it now because of the glass, but bell cricket songs are really loud, . It's like, we all get itâ€”your lungs are super strong. Now quit showing off!
Oh, a cicada shell! These things are kinda fun to crush, .
That rosalia batesi beetle's jaws look super buff! Think it's been training?
Y'know, if this damselfly put on a little more muscle, it could probably compete in the flyweight class
Hey, mosquito! My blood's mine, got it? Mine! You can't have it. Whew. Just had to get that out.
Yo! Did you donate this bug? That's really cool of you!I just can't stop staring at it. I'm learning a TON about bug muscles, !
Oh, I see. If someone comes at you like THIS, you gotta counter like THAT, !
